Detailed Description

This class is a dynamic vector of elements. The vector can grow when more elements are added. Each element can have a default size.

uint32  cap = 5,
uint32  incr = 3
) 
 

Build a vector of elements. The vector can grow dynamically when new elements are added.

Parameters:
isize initial item size.
cap initial capacity (no. of items).
incr number of new item slot to add when the vector grows.

void uStreamLib::Vector::removeAll (  void   ) 
 

Remove all elements. The vector will not change its size. Memory will be the same as before this call.
